Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma, the vice-captain of this year’s Indian squad, made his T20I debut during the inaugural T20 World Cup held in 2007.
Mohammad Hafeez, the veteran Pakistan all-rounder, opened the innings for Pakistan in the inaugural ICC T20 World Cup Final.
Shoaib Malik, the ‘Ageless’ Pakistan all-rounder, captained Pakistan in the inaugural T20 World Cup final against India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The two arch-rivals will go head-to-head on October 24, 2021, more than 14 years after their ICC T20 World Cup 2007 final.
India will kick off their campaign against Pakistan, the runners-up of the 2007 T20 World Cup at the Dubai International Stadium.
Others: The Round 1 of the competition has almost ended, and all eyes will be on the Super 12 matches now.
